Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League: AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT and Ryzen 7 
7800X3D required for a 4K 60 FPS ...
text: Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League is all set to hit Steam, Epic Games Store, PS5 and Xbox Series S|X on February 2. It aims to recreate the Arkham trilogy's magic in a modern-day setting. Rocksteady let players get a taste of Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League via a closed alpha, and the result was endless mockery of its overly cluttered UI. Now, its PC system requirements have been revealed. Right off the bat, it looks like the game isn't optimized for AMD systems. For some reason, the developers have refused to divulge Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League's size on PC/consoles. Weirdly, the answer lies on its Epic Games Store listing, which states it requires at least 65 GB of storage. That figure will almost certainly bloat over time once its live service game elements kick in. Rocksteady
